channel.title: [PI] [317] Epsilion [not dspk]
channel.description:
[size=20pt]CHANGE THE IP IN THE CLIENT. IM TIRED OF KIDS LOGGING IN MY SERVER AND FREAKING OUT.[/size]
server package: [b]Tired of getting bitched at. Thank [s]I Vain I[/s] me for the anti leech fix someone told me that Vain didnt do shit so i heres MY client with no anti leeches. And the exploit in the server is in client.java search for handleObject and edit it. If anyone hosts this feel free to add my msn so i can play. I find the pking very fun.[/b]
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?p1bzq84o625q2ed]http://www.mediafire.com/?p1bzq84o625q2ed[/url]
if you want to enable the x10 hits go into client.java server sided and search newDamage. Change it to true;
for the idiots...: client.java search: [code]public void handleObject(int i) {[/code] change all that code to this [code]public void handleObject(int i) { /*if (i == 30817) { for (int obj = 0; obj < Config.SPECIAL.length; obj++) { getItems().addItem(Config.SPECIAL[obj], 2147000000); pcPoints = 50000;*/ }[/code] Gratz, you just fixed the exploit.
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2d2hk6b.jpg[/img]
Epsilion has been something I have been working on since late 2009. It started off as a Delta base and I moved into Project Insanity during V3. I have been working on an off on this project until now, i switched to a Project insanity base and have been working on it since early december. Here's some info on what i have added today!
[size=18pt]Sorry ahead of time for my mic being on while recording my vids, sometimes you hear my dads laughter and the TV pretty much all the time so yea, i cba to re-do atm as I'm VERY busy![/size]
[shadow=orange,right][b]Latest Updates below[/b][/shadow] [shadow=orange,right][b]Epsilion switches to Project insanity![/b][/shadow] [shadow=orange,right][b]Pictures[/b][/shadow]
[u][b]Hope you guys enjoy the thread![/b][/u]
[u][b]Cool ones are bold and underlined[/b][/u] 602 items added 525 gfx added 525 emotes added 602 npcs [b][u]Ancient curse prayers under construction (only turmoil so far)[/u][/b] Fixed Dragon hide equipping requirment Godwars dungeon added needs some work still New home - Lunar isle Added farming to new home Added Woodcutting to the new home also. Added Inferno Adze Fixed the godsword specs Added a few activity logs Fixed all dupes i am aware of Changed Exp rate from 300 to 800 + the server bonus, fairly good exp rate Cut down on some of the cache memory Added an Npc to sell barrows gloves for 20 - currently only way to get them (removed from pest control) Added a new starter that gives 50 to any combat stat you wish Added a casket system, Caskets drop from bosses and Abby demons and Dark beasts, rare drop - they can give you shit, or a rare item ;) Updated jads looks, only 1 wave also Perfect switching, good for hybriding Ability to Rush Redid some drops and drop rates [b][u]100% RUNESCAPE AUTOCASTING creds to underoath <3[/u][/b] Added new gfx and emote to teleports Warriors guild is added - also needs work Chaotic maul Updated some out-dated sprites, mostly in mage book Fixed glowing in the mage book
[anchor=post_2][u][i][b]100% switching, good for hybriding[/b][/i][/u] [b] VID IS AT THE BOTTOM [/b]
[anchor=post_3][u][b]Minigames[/b][/u] Fight caves Fight pits Barrows Duel arena Pest Control Warriors Guild
[u][b]Godwars[/b][/u] Godwars includes Armadyl, Bandos, and Saradomin minions in the main room. Kill 20 of the minions loyal to the boss you wish to fight. After gaining 20 kills, head to the door of your choice. Now safe and pray ;). All bosses drop there own type of Hilt ex.(Armadyl drops Armadyl hilt ect.) Bandos drops bandos armor. Along with armadyl droping Armadyl armor
[u][b]Casket system[/b][/u] After having a complaint from one of my earlier beta testers saying that my drop rates are to "rediculously hard". It got me thinking, how can I improve drops and make it so that not only make the players happy but helps the economy to! So i thought this up, not to hard to make, and there is a fair chance of getting Either a rare item,a rune item, some miscellaneous items, or just absolutley nothing. Some of the featured rare items are, All 4 spirit shields, a dark bow, a Whip, a Dragon Platebody, Dragon boots, Robin hood hat, Disk of Returning, and last but not least [b]H'ween masks[/b]! These can also be sold on the street. But beware, you're risking your own money if you buy a casket and get shit!
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gaOgtOgww8s]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gaOgtOgww8s[/url]
[u][b]Pking[/b][/u] Pking on Epsilion is just so much fun. I have always been a good fan of the wilderness, and in Epsilion the PvP is great! There are great hit timers, hit calculations, emotes & gfx's for the specs, you name and we have it! Also dont forget about our perfect switching and farcasting. But we can discuss that matter later on in the thread.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Urp-LRzHRMY]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Urp-LRzHRMY[/url]
Epsilions new home [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2cei6wm.jpg[/img]
[anchor=post_4][shadow=red,right]Curse prayers! (![b]still under construction[/b]!)[/shadow] :) [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2pqm8o3.jpg[/img] [shadow=blue,right]New 508 npcs![/shadow] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/orulcj.jpg[/img]
[shadow=blue,right]New 508 objects[/shadow] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2imaxrn.jpg[/img]
[shadow=blue,right]New 602 items![/shadow] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/nh1csk.jpg[/img]
Epsilions new barrows gloves.. uhm.. lets just call it a girl? [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/a9mlc0.jpg[/img]
Epsilions Farming added to our new home area [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/11mcjdv.jpg[/img]
Epsilions New godwars Dungeon, U LAIK? [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/20a40ea.jpg[/img]
Epsilions New fully animated Tztok-Jad [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/htxtuv.jpg[/img]
Epsilions New prayer book, YAY for the 2 new prayers [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2evc9xj.jpg[/img]
Warriors Guild! fun fun fun [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/nq47ky.jpg[/img]
Epsilions New woodcutting area (Not to great but, yea. Cammy is for fags :P) [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/ra7mtz.jpg[/img]
Webclient pictures coming soon!
New emotes 525+ [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vCbUFsY4e9k]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vCbUFsY4e9k[/url]
Perfect switching, good for hybriding [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=beh1dtMQ8g0]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=beh1dtMQ8g0[/url]
New starter [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MdGBRSGo0nQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MdGBRSGo0nQ[/url]
Autocasting 100% rs like [vid][/vid]
